title: CSE: 2015-0811 - Delist - Corona Gold Corporation (CRG)
text:
August 26, 2015 13:24 ET CSE: 2015-0811 - Delist - Corona Gold Corporation (CRG) 
TORONTO, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - Aug. 26, 2015) - The common shares of Corona Gold Corporation will be delisted at the market close today, August 26, 2015. 
The common shares will be delisted in connection with the arrangement between Corona Gold, Oban Mining Corporation, Eagle Hill Exploration Corporation and Ryan Gold Corp. completed on August 25, 2015 pursuant to which Oban Mining Corporation acquired all of the outstanding shares of Corona Gold, among others. The full particulars of the arrangement are set forth in Corona Gold's Information Circular dated July 20, 2015, which is available under Corona Gold's profile on SEDAR. Date: Market close, August 26, 2015 Symbol: CRG
